verbs.description: [ARG0: The former homeland security chief] [V: says] [ARG1: he told Comey that Trump might take the message as a threat]
The former homeland security chief says [ARG0: he] [V: told] [ARG2: Comey] [ARG1: that Trump might take the message as a threat]
The former homeland security chief says he told Comey that Trump [V: might] take the message as a threat
The former homeland security chief says he told Comey that [ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-MOD: might] [V: take] [ARG1: the message] [ARG2: as a threat]
